meanings.definition: The action of explaining the meaning of something.
meanings.sent1: Her interpretation of the poem helped everyone understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's interpretation of the historical event was insightful.
meanings.sent3: His interpretation of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The artist's interpretation of the landscape was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The interpreter's interpretation of the speech was flawless.

meanings.definition: A particular way of performing a piece of music or a role in a play.
meanings.sent1: The pianist's interpretation of the sonata was emotional.
meanings.sent2: The actor's interpretation of the character was captivating.
meanings.sent3: Her interpretation of the dance routine added a unique flair.
meanings.sent4: The singer's interpretation of the song was soulful.
meanings.sent5: The conductor's interpretation of the symphony was masterful.

meanings.definition: The way in which someone perceives or understands something.
meanings.sent1: His interpretation of the situation was optimistic.
meanings.sent2: The child's interpretation of the story was imaginative.
meanings.sent3: Their interpretation of the painting was quite creative.
meanings.sent4: The detective's interpretation of the evidence was crucial.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's interpretation of the data led to a breakthrough.
